title: Return to Now

• Prior to agriculture, humans lived happier, healthier, freer and easier lives, claims one of the world’s top scientists and thinkers. In an article published in Discover Magazine nearly 30 years ago, Pulitzer Prize winning anthropologist and evolutionary biologist Jared Diamond calls agriculture “a catastrophe from which we have never recovered.”

• Jarawa Hunter-Gatherers Say They Don’t Want to Be Part of Our World World’s oldest hunter-gatherers are being forced into civilization and treated like animals in a zoo Sign the petition telling the government to leave them alone Like the Hadza of East Africa, the Jarawa hunter-gatherers of the Andaman Islands also face extinction, thanks to the ever-expanding nature of agriculture and civilization.
